note: RADARFIELD was founded in 2010 in the formation: Voc/Git – Bass – Keys – Drums in Berlin. The drummer was replaced by a drum machine in 2011 and when the bassplayer has left the band, RADARFIELD used more „electronic“ . In January 2024, RADARFIELD was recommended on the "Whitelight-Whiteheat" website at WEEKLY POST-PUNK // DARKWAVE // DARK SYNTH TIPS – JANUARY 2024. In the same month, "Angel in the Dark" added the video for "VAMPIRE DIARY" (including lyrics) to the playlist on their YouTube
